CustomField.description: Defines the state of the appointment. None: must be selected by user, Added: Added to selected appointments but can be removed, Added and Required: Added to appointments and can not be removed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the state of the appointment. None: must be selected by user, Added: Added to selected appointments but can be removed, Added and Required: Added to appointments and can not be removed.
CustomField.label: Chosen State
